inquiries at fog dot haus

We see an increasing trend in consumers and businesses wanting sustainable, philanthropic, and uplifting goods and services.

We like that.

And we know that the demand will continue to grow. Why? We’re just like you. We’re consumers and we’re business owners. We support socially conscious products and we build them, too. We’ve helped companies launch, grow, and generate revenue while empowering their users to live better lives.

We started fog so we could work together to build more of those.

“We’re just like you… consumers and business owners.”

We’re experienced designers, advisors, and creative technologists on a mission to fuel startups that want to solve problems (big and small) in a profitable and sustainable way.

We have three core tenets.

Empowerment

New cloud and mobile technologies are driving a digital democratization as broadly accessible solutions emerge across education.

Social Good

We’re on the hunt for startups that are pursuing massive improvements in human health, wellness, and performance across nutrition, fitness, and medicine.

Sustainability

We believe we can live in a world of abundance by unlocking new ways of generating, consuming, and re-purposing resources.

So, tell us about yourself.
